In answer to your second question, basically the slow tests would run
at ch=
eck in, or during the general build process, whereas the fast
test would ju=
st be part of the TDD of making sure everything is green.
For point of comp=
arison, the slow tests are currently 1/2 hour for
less than 100, and the fa=
st tests are under 60 seconds, even though
there are about 700 of them.

--=
